#labels Featured
Base packages are:
 * source package
 * Windows x86 (XP, Vista, 7)
 * Mac OS X (10.5 or later)

These packages can be obtained [http://code.google.com/p/violetland/downloads/list here].

In additional there is a set of derivative packages for the different systems based on releases and SVN:
 * [http://www.freshports.org/games/violetland FreeBSD]
 * [http://packages.gentoo.org/package/games-action/violetland Gentoo]
 * Fedora [http://www.ddt.cs.vsu.ru/dexpl/rpms/fc10/violetland-0.2.4/ 10], [http://www.ddt.cs.vsu.ru/dexpl/rpms/fc11/violetland-0.2.4/ 11], [http://www.ddt.cs.vsu.ru/dexpl/rpms/fc12/violetland-0.2.4/ 12]
 * Arch Linux [http://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?ID=31542 releases], [http://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?ID=31486 svn]
 * [http://www.playdeb.net/software/Violetland playdeb Ubuntu]
 * [http://www.sisyphus.ru/en/srpm/Sisyphus/violetland ALTLinux] or "apt-get install violetland"
 * PiSi [http://www.playdeb.net/software/Violetland package], [http://svn.pardus-linux.org/paketler/P2009-free/violetland build files]
 * [http://frugalware.org/packages/88904 Frugalware] or "pacman-g2 -S violetland"
 * [http://packman.links2linux.org/package/violetland openSuse]

Many thanks to all who lets know about new packages or make own packages.

Please [http://groups.google.com/group/violetland let us know] if you've played Violetland on something not in the list above!
